SELECT sum(total_detail + total_exp + freight) AS totalMoney, count(1) AS orderCount, office.id AS officeId, office.name AS officeName, sum(sku.buy_price) AS buyPrice FROM biz_order_header AS header LEFT JOIN biz_custom_center_consultant AS consultant ON consultant.cust_id = header.cust_id LEFT JOIN sys_office AS office ON consultant.center_id = office.id LEFT JOIN biz_order_detail AS detail ON detail.order_id = header.id LEFT JOIN biz_sku_info AS sku ON sku.id = detail.sku_id WHERE ( biz_status = #{item.state}
OR (biz_status = ${@com.wanhutong.backend.modules.enums.OrderHeaderBizStatusEnum@DELETE.state} AND receive_total > 0)) AND date_format(header.create_time, '%Y-%m') = #{month} AND office.type = #{officeType} GROUP BY office.id

SELECT s.name,count(1) as count FROM biz_custom_center_consultant c, sys_office s WHERE c.cust_id = ANY ( SELECT s1.id from sys_office AS s1, sys_user AS u1 where s1.id = u1.company_id AND s1.type = 6 AND date_format(s1.create_date, '%Y-%m') = #{month} AND s1.status = ${@com.wanhutong.backend.common.persistence.BaseEntity@DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND u1.status = ${@com.wanhutong.backend.common.persistence.BaseEntity@DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}) AND c.status = ${@com.wanhutong.backend.common.persistence.BaseEntity@DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND s.status = ${@com.wanhutong.backend.common.persistence.BaseEntity@DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and s.id = c.center_id and s.TYPE =8 GROUP BY center_id
